description:
Bai is http://anidb.net/ch7571 [Hei]`s younger sister. Bai is the Contractor responsible for the disappearance of Heaven`s Gate five years prior to the story`s setting and had since vanished.
The Messier code BK-201 belongs to her star. Bai`s abilities are said to be vast, with generating abnormal electricity as only the tip of the iceberg. In addition to this, she also has the power of molecular reconstruction. Her remuneration is to sleep.
name: Bai
